forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 50. South wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 1am, then a chance of snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers before 5pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 29, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. West wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Coyote from 8 to 10.Softer and more control than Tuesday. Tracks are good with a lot of leaves.

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday. We will not groom until the temperature goes below freezing. Coverage is still very good.
nubsNob.comments: It's a warm ski day at Nub's Nob. The temperature is forecast to go above 40 degrees, which should result in  soft snow conditions this afternoon. Snow depth and coverage continues to be very good. Pintail Peak opens this Friday. The Big Park opens on Saturday. Lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
